A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I've never reviewed here before. Signed up just to do so. 

What can I say that hasn't been said all ready? This movie is beautiful - but boy is it stupid! Tragically stupid.

I'll just sum it up like this: JJ Abrams sets up Rian Johnson with the sweetest aliey-oop of all time. Rian's in the air - grabs the ball for the slam dunk! He then lands\, chucks the ball into the nose bleed seats\, places his palms at his mouth and makes a fart noise then flips off everything Star Wars was or ever could be.

How this absolute mess of a motion picture got past anyone for production is beyond me.

Simply irredeemable.
